trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從快取中擷取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> retrieved from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取中擷取的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property to the item you wish to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 當處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>設定事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A>屬性，以您想要擷取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item to retrieve from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得要從快取中擷取之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to retrieve from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要從快取中擷取之項目的索引。
